item.title: WebSockets for dummies | The Sloth Blog
item.description: A simple write up on what is WebSocket protocol and how does it work. WebSocket protocol enables two way real-time communication between a client and a server over a TCP connection. One well known example where WebSockets are beneficial is a chat applications. By implementing chat over WebSocket protocol we get a live view of a chat window without having to re-load the browser page int order to fetch the new messages.
